hymn.title: But of Him you are in Christ Jesus
hymn.chords: | C - - - | C - - - | Em - Am - | Dm - G7 - | C - G7 - | C - - - | Em - Am - | Dm - G7 - | C - C7 - | F - G7 - | C - Am - | Dm - G7 - | C - C7 - | F - G7 - | E7 - Am - | Dm - Dm7 - | G - G7 - | C - - - | Em - Am - | Dm - G7 - | Am - C/G - | F - G7 - | C F/C C - ||

layout.singingstanza: But of Him you are in Christ Je -- sus, Who be -- came wis -- dom to us from God: both right -- eous -- ness and sanc -- ti -- fi -- ca -- tion and re -- demp -- tion, And the God of peace Him -- self sanc -- ti -- fy you whol -- ly, and may your spir -- it and soul and bod -- y be pre -- served com -- plete, with -- out blame, at the com -- ing of our Lord Je -- sus Christ, of our Lord Je -- sus Christ.

lyrics.stanza: But of Him you are in Christ Jesus, Who became wisdom to us from God: Both righteousness and sanctification And redemption,
And the God of peace Himself Sanctify you wholly, And may your spirit and soul and body Be preserved complete, Without blame, at the coming Of our Lord Jesus Christ, Of our Lord Jesus Christ.
